detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in ribbed, cotton-blend jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

A-line dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with hemstitch details, a round neck and opening with buttons at the back. Long trumpet sleeves with crochet lace trims. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, flared legs with creases and raw-edge hems.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a pattern-weave cotton blend with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Short checked shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed, adjustable belt with a metal fastener and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides of the hems.

Knee-length, bell-shaped skirt in a sturdy weave with pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the top. Concealed zip at the back and concealed side pockets.
Short, straight-cut coat in a patterned, textured weave with lapels, 3/4-length sleeves and no buttons. Seam at the waist and on the sleeves, and slits in the sides . Unlined.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Low crotch, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Imitation leather sandals with adjustable foot straps with metal buckles, an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, moulded rubber insoles and fluted rubber soles.
